plot: Armand and Yvette, a couple in their sixties, find one night a young wounded woman outside their apartment building. They take her home, take care of her, fancy her. And they dream.
title: Toutes les jeunes filles sont en fleur
plot_es: Armand and Yvette, a couple in their sixties, find one night a young wounded woman outside their apartment building. They take her home, take care of her, fancy her. And they dream.
original_name: Toutes les jeunes filles sont en fleur
